title: Depart de Grandes Vacances
brief_description: A sequel to “La Famille Marin” a language training film in which the sound track records conversations and commentary is simple French Everyday expressions and simple vocabulary are used throughout the film. The Martin family is shown preparing to do on a holiday. The various members are seen packing with greater or less success. The luggage is safely stowed with one omission - the luncheon basket is left behind, unnoticed on the pavement. The misadventures of the family are followed throughout their holiday excursion.
